title: [QUESTION] Possible GC issues with HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.FromStream

comments.author: TJYSunset
comments.body:
Can confirm this is actually a problem. At best all codepoints in `Buffer.GlyphInfos` becomes `0`, at worst `AccessViolationException` will be thrown.

For anyone else also encountering this nasty bug, a workaround is to allocate the blob's memory yourself with [`Marshal.AllocHGlobal`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.allochglobal?view=net-7.0), then instantiate the `Blob` with [`public Blob (IntPtr data, int length, MemoryMode mode, ReleaseDelegate releaseDelegate)`](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/2ad29861d5a40d3bf78c28ab0a9cb02a8f0fe437/binding/HarfBuzzSharp.Shared/Blob.cs#L30).
